feed.subtitle: Tuning the Silence Into A Harmony of Matter

entry.title: King Gizzard and the Lizard Wizard Alligator Fiber Art
entry.content:
Process

I'm a big fan of King Gizz and wanted to create a piece inspired by them. The alligator is available in a simple 2d outline that was perfect for tufting. I decided to mount it on a thin piece of birch that I painted bright purple. I got the paint in the samples section for $2 and I think it provides a perfect backdrop.

This is an early piece so there are still some rough edges. The top of the back could have been a thicker outline. I also chose not to give it pupils as I didn't think it would look very good as a small dot of yarn.

Materials

Yarn

  • acrylic

Wood

  • birch
